explanation: [0-0] In a sunlit room, a young woman with long, tangled brown hair is facing the window, struggling to comb it. She is wearing a purple tank top and red shorts with a heart pattern.
[0-4] Then, on the right side of the screen, a man with blond hair holding a bouquet of roses appears, knocking on the door. Purple and red subtitles appear on the screen.
[0-4] Then, on the right side of the screen, a man with blond hair holding a bouquet of roses appears, knocking on the door. Purple and red subtitles appear on the screen.

[4-12] A button with the words "Help her" appears on the screen. A hand emerges from the bottom of the screen and clicks the button. Sparks surround the woman's hair, and the scene transitions to the same room, now with a blurred background. The woman looks sadly at her hair, which still has leaves stuck in it. The scene switches to the room's interior, revealing light green and white wallpaper and a window framing blue skies and white clouds. The woman, still in her previous outfit, appears disheartened. Three options appear on the left side of the screen: a roller, a pair of scissors, and a razor. A hand reaches up from the bottom of the screen and selects the scissors, cutting the woman's hair. A heart on the left disappears, and a yellow circle with the word "FAIL" written inside appears on the screen.
